headline: Verizon Posts Strong Subscriber Gains in Its First Quarter Under New CEO
summary: Verizon Communications  gained a net 616,000 postpaid phone connections in the fourth quarter, with its chief executive calling the period a “critical inflection point.”  Dan Schulman  took over as chief executive officer of the nation’s largest wireless carrier in October with a mandate to execute cost cuts and a strategic turnaround after it lost ground to rivals.  This month he faced a major test as many Verizon customers lost service during an hourslong network outage.

This month he faced a major test as many Verizon customers lost service during an hourslong network outage.
